subject: Ethics
title: Legal Protections for Whistleblowers
description: Learn Legal Protections for Whistleblowers in one minute.

hook.text: A nurse reports unsafe staffing levels. She's fired within a month. The hospital calls it 'restructuring.'

buildup.text: The US has over 50 whistleblower protection laws, each covering different industries and types of misconduct.

discovery.text: The Dodd-Frank Act lets SEC whistleblowers earn 10-30% of sanctions over $1 million. Some earned hundreds of millions.

twist.text: Financial rewards work. But most industries offer no bountyâ€”just a promise not to fire you that's hard to enforce.

climax.text: Proving retaliation is on the whistleblower. Legal battles take years. Most people can't afford the fight.

punchline.text: The law protects whistleblowers on paper. Reality is more expensive.

quiz.question: What incentive does the Dodd-Frank Act provide for SEC whistleblowers?
options: Automatic immunity from all criminal prosecution
